Class TierEdit<T>

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.undo.AbstractUndoableEdit
ca.phon.app.session.editor.undo.SessionEditorUndoableEdit
ca.phon.app.session.editor.undo.TierEdit<T>

IExtendable, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.undo.UndoableEdit
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlindTierEdit, IPALookupEdit
public class TierEdit<T>
extends SessionEditorUndoableEdit
A change to the value of a group in a tier.
